definition[0]: moral goodness of character and behaviour
example[0]: Women have often been used as symbols of virtue.
definition[1]: a particular good quality in someoneâ€™s character
example[1]: Among her many virtues are loyalty, courage, and truthfulness.
definition[2]: an advantage that makes something better or more useful than something else
example[2]: Wilkins is now extolling (=praising very much) the virtues of organic farming.
example[3]: Adam Smith believed in the virtues of free trade.
definition[3]: the state of not having with someone, or not having sex with anyone except your husband
